original_text: They wanted to do that because many Jews now refused to obey them. Instead, these Jews believed in Jesus because of what he had done for Lazarus.
korean_text: 나사로 때문에 많은 유대인이 가서 예수를 믿음이러라

sentences.original_text: because many Jews now refused to obey them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 많은 유대인들이 이제 그들을 따르기를 거부했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, these Jews believed in Jesus
because of what he had done for Lazarus
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나사로를 위해 행한 일 때문에
